attributes.action: Introduce Short Term Removal/Reduction of Capital Gains Tax where investments being redirected into mortgages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the current 'credit crunch' and mortgage crisis, propose that the Government introduce a period whereby capital gains tax is removed (or reduced) where members of the public are cashing in and redirecting investments into mortgages on their primary residence.
